templateOptions.label: Create user when not found
templateOptions.description: When toggled, if the user account is not found, a new the AFAS user account will be created in the create action (only in the create action).

templateOptions.label: Update on update
templateOptions.description: When toggled, if the mapped data differs from data in AFAS, the AFAS user will be updated when a update is triggerd

templateOptions.label: Update User ID
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the User ID will be updated if it doesn't match mapped naming convention. Use with care! This can break certain links in AFAS. Please consult AFAS first.

templateOptions.label: Toggle debug logging
templateOptions.description: When toggled, debug logging will be displayed
